name: KaRu (itch)
description:
KaRu is a short, horror visual novel game where you play as a Parasite. He wakes up next to a young boy he never met in a place they shouldn't be. Now they have to trust each other and find a way out.

The game is about 15-30 minutes long and it has four endings.

It is meant as an introductory to many games that will be taking place in the same universe.
